title: JPMorgan's Been Hacked, But Answers — And Fraud — Are Hard To Find
teaser: Hackers successfully infiltrated the computer systems of JPMorgan Chase and at least four other banks recently. The FBI is investigating what's being called a sophisticated cyberattack, but bank officials have not yet found any evidence of fraud.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
